page.title: Plan your visit
page.content:
Plan Your Visit

Anchoring a vibrant new quarter of concept stores, galleries, restaurants, landscaped gardens and public art spaces, Mercury Tower soars above the surrounding cityscape. The exceptional apartments within offer a rare way of living in this storied St Julianâ€™s destination.



  • By Bus


  • By Car

  • By Taxi

By Bus

There are two buses that service The Dubai Mall every 16 minutes: route 27 from the Deira Gold Souk station and route 29 from Ghubaiba bus station.The buses arrive and depart from the tourist drop-off area located in front of the Grand Drive Entrance, Lower Ground Floor of The Dubai Mall.

There are two buses that service The Dubai Mall every 15 minutes: route 27 from the Deira Gold Souk station and route 29 from Ghubaiba bus station.

The buses arrive and depart from the tourist drop-off area located in front of the Grand Drive Entrance, Lower Ground Floor of The Dubai Mall.

Click here to Plan your journey aboard the Dubai Bus.
